channel.title: If i ruled the world i'd
channel.description:
basically say what you would do if you ruled the world. no [b][u]rude stuff please[/u][/b]
ill start "if i ruled the world i'd kick Steve mcClaren's ass for his crap job as england's manager."

item.title: If i ruled the world i'd
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

I’d take all the goverments money and blow it on chocolate and shit.

Read full topic

item.title: If i ruled the world i'd
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

i’d probardly,

nuke a few countrys (maybe a bit tude but hey!)
make denmark international
make a better internet
make most stuff free like medicine. you know how much is cost?? omg…

and loads of other stuff… would probardly fill 20 pages or more in word.

Read full topic

item.title: If i ruled the world i'd
item.dc:creator: @server_dude server dude
item.description:
@server_dude wrote:

make an end to all wars and conflicts so everyone can live in _peace_,
sorry you mist the try outs for miss world ;)

also i would

emorgrate to america because the UK sucks
buy a very VERY fast car
sit on my throne and watch the world run…
ooo and maybe send germany an earthquake ( im not fond of germans ) sorry if this sounds racist in anyway, shape or form.

Read full topic

item.title: If i ruled the world i'd
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

i’d
be very smart handsome and strong,
make an end to all wars and conflicts so everyone can live in peace,
make everyone listen to death metal,
nuke M$,
make OSS rule the world,
kick some people’s butts

can’t think of anything else!
edit:
i’d also do something about global warming!
